members.joinCircumstances: Ace founded and led the Spade Pirates before joining the Whitebeard Pirates.
Member of the Spade Pirates under Ace's leadership.

keyMoments.title: Spade Pirates Revealed in Flashback
keyMoments.description: The Spade Pirates appear for the first time in flashback, showing Ace's crew before joining Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ace's history as an independent captain before becoming part of the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Spade Pirates Challenge Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: The Spade Pirates, led by Ace, challenge Whitebeard after Ace's five-day battle with Jinbe.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's loyalty to Ace and their willingness to follow him even against the strongest pirate.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Defeats the Spade Pirates
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard easily defeats the entire Spade Pirates crew, demonstrating the difference in power.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Spade Pirates as an independent crew before they join the Whitebeard Pirates.

ships.description: The ship used by the Spade Pirates during their journey in the New World.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a spade symbol behind it

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Pirates Begin War at Marineford
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates launch their assault on Marineford to rescue Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the greatest war in One Piece history.

keyMoments.title: Spade Pirates Join Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: After defeating the Spade Pirates, Whitebeard recruits them into his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how the Whitebeard Pirates grew and how Ace became part of the family.

keyMoments.title: Ace Becomes Second Division Commander
keyMoments.description: Ace is promoted to Second Division Commander, one of the highest positions in the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ace's importance within the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Betrays and Murders Thatch
keyMoments.description: Marshall D. Teach murders Fourth Division Commander Thatch to steal the Yami Yami no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: The greatest betrayal in the crew's history, leading to the events of Marineford.

ships.description: Whitebeard's main flagship, a massive whale-shaped ship.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a white mustache and crossbones
